q.quote: I feel that the great challenge of our time is the communication of ideas.
q.author: Alain de Botton

q.quote: Be fair with others, but then keep after them until they're fair with you.
q.author: Alan Alda

q.quote: I always feel over-appreciated but underestimated
q.author: Alan Bennett

q.quote: You are doing better than you think you are.
q.author: Alan Cohen

q.quote: All sides in a trial want to hide at least some of the truth
q.author: Alan Dershowitz

q.quote: If I turn out to be particularly clear, you've probably misunderstood what I've said
q.author: Alan Greenspan

q.quote: Don't leave home without your sword - your intellect.
q.author: Alan Moore

q.quote: I'm a lot less serious than people think.
q.author: Alan Rickman

q.quote: Nobody can honestly say that they never lie
q.author: Alan Sugar

q.quote: Machines take me by surprise with great frequency.
q.author: Alan Turing

q.quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
q.author: Alan Watts

q.quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
q.author: Alanis Morissette

q.quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower
q.author: Albert Camus

q.quote: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
q.author: Albert Einstein

q.quote: I hope to die in the saddle seat.
q.author: Albert Ellis
